statements: SELECT review_id, employee_id, review_date, review_notes, is_completed FROM performance_reviews;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT review_id, employee_id, review_date FROM performance_reviews WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT review_id, review_notes FROM performance_reviews WHERE is_completed = true;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC, employee_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, review_date, review_notes FROM performance_reviews WHERE review_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT review_id, employee_id, review_notes FROM performance_reviews WHERE is_completed = TRUE ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(review_id) AS review_count FROM performance_reviews GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(review_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE review_notes LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT review_notes FROM performance_reviews WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE first_name = 'John' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, count(*) AS review_count FROM performance_reviews GROUP BY employee_id HAVING review_count > 2;
SELECT e.first_name, pr.review_date FROM employees e JOIN performance_reviews pr ON e.employee_id = pr.employee_id ORDER BY pr.review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceReviews;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM Employees;
SELECT review_date, performance_rating FROM PerformanceReviews WHERE reviewer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM PerformanceReviews;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR' AND hire_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, review_date, performance_rating FROM PerformanceReviews JOIN Employees ON PerformanceReviews.employee_id = Employees.employee_id WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceReviewReminders;
SELECT employee_id, reminder_date FROM PerformanceReviewReminders ORDER BY reminder_date DESC;
SELECT review_id, employee_id, review_date, performance_rating FROM PerformanceReviews WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT scheduled_by FROM ReviewScheduling;
SELECT employee_id, reviewer_id FROM ReviewHistory WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM PerformanceReviewReminders WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT reminder_date, reminder_message FROM PerformanceReviewReminders WHERE employee_id = 1 AND reminder_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, MAX(reminder_date) AS latest_reminder_date FROM PerformanceReviewReminders GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT R.employee_id, R.reminder_date, PR.review_date FROM PerformanceReviewReminders R JOIN PerformanceReviews PR ON R.employee_id = PR.employee_id;
SELECT RH.employee_id, RH.review_id, RH.review_date, PR.performance_rating FROM ReviewHistory RH JOIN PerformanceReviews PR ON RH.employee_id = PR.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, email FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reviews ORDER BY performance_rating DESC, review_date ASC;
SELECT team_name, manager_id FROM teams WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY employee_name DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01' AND hire_date <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT employee_name, hire_date, department FROM employees WHERE employee_name LIKE '%Johnson%' AND department = 'Marketing'
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date ASC
